00020     SECryptoAES256::SECryptoAES256()
00021     {
00022         this->setObjectName("SECryptoAES256");
00023         m_logger = new Logger(this);
00024         m_init = new QCA::Initializer;
00025 
00026         m_isQcaCompatible = QCA::isSupported("aes256-cbc-pkcs7");
00027 
00028         if( m_isQcaCompatible )
00029         {
00030             m_logger->info(name() + ": aes256-cbc-pkcs7 supported by system [OK]");
00031             m_key = QCA::SymmetricKey( QString(name()+"%/.?!:;]{[}&").toUtf8() );
00032         }
00033         else
00034         {
00035             m_logger->warning(name() + ": aes256-cbc-pkcs7 supported by system [KO]");
00036             QList<QCA::Provider*> prov = QCA::providers();
00037             m_logger->debug("> QCA2: " + QString::number(prov.size()) + " providers found");
00038             for(int i = 0; i<prov.size(); i++)
00039                 m_logger->debug(prov.at(i)->name());
00040         
00041             m_logger->debug(QCA::pluginDiagnosticText());
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     SECryptoAES256::~SECryptoAES256()
00046     {
00047         delete m_init;
00048         delete m_logger;
00049     }
00050 
00051     QString SECryptoAES256::name() const
00052     {
00053         return QString("Silent Eye Encryption "+typeSupported());
00054     }

00056     QString SECryptoAES256::version() const
00057     {
00058         return QString("1.0.0");
00059     }

00061     QString SECryptoAES256::status() const
00062     {
00063         if(m_isQcaCompatible)
00064             return "OK|aes256-cbc-pkcs7 supported by system";
00065         else
00066             return "KO|'aes256-cbc-pkcs7' not supported by system.\nPlease check your 'libqca2-plugin-ossl' installation.";
00067     }

00069     QString SECryptoAES256::typeSupported() const
00070     {
00071         return QString("AES256");
00072     }
00073 
00074     QPointer<EncodedData> SECryptoAES256::encode(QString key, QPointer<EncodedData> msg)
00075     {
00076         if(!m_isQcaCompatible){
00077             throw ModuleException("aes256-cbc-pkcs7 is not supported by the system.");
00078         }
00079 
00080         QCA::InitializationVector iv( QCA::SecureArray(key.toUtf8()) );
00081 
00082         // create a 128 bit AES cipher object using Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode
00083         QCA::Cipher cipher(QString("aes256"),QCA::Cipher::CBC,
00084                            // use Default padding, which is equivalent to PKCS7 for CBC
00085                            QCA::Cipher::DefaultPadding,
00086                            // this object will encrypt
00087                            QCA::Encode,
00088                            m_key, iv);
00089 
00090         // we use the cipher object to encrypt the argument we passed in
00091         // the result of that is returned - note that if there is less than
00092         // 1 block, then nothing will be returned - it is buffered
00093         // update() can be called as many times as required.
00094         QCA::SecureArray u = cipher.update( QCA::SecureArray(msg->bytes()) );
00095 
00096         if (!cipher.ok())
00097             throw ModuleException("An error occured during the encryption process.",
00098                                   "An error occured during the cipher update !");
00099 
00100         if(msg->format() != Data::FILE)
00101             m_logger->debug("aes256 non-final encryption of " + QCA::arrayToHex(msg->bytes()) + " is " + QCA::arrayToHex(u.toByteArray()) );
00102 
00103         // Because we are using PKCS7 padding, we need to output the final (padded) block
00104         // Note that we should always call final() even with no padding, to clean up
00105         QCA::SecureArray f = cipher.final();
00106 
00107         if (!cipher.ok())
00108             throw ModuleException("An error occured during the encryption process.",
00109                                   "An error occured during the finalization of the cipher !");
00110 
00111         return new EncodedData(u.append(f).toByteArray(), Data::BYTES, false);
00112     }
00113 
00114     QPointer<EncodedData> SECryptoAES256::decode(QString key, QPointer<EncodedData> data)
00115     {
00116         if(!m_isQcaCompatible){
00117             throw ModuleException("aes256-cbc-pkcs7 is not supported by the system.");
00118         }
00119 
00120         QCA::InitializationVector iv( QCA::SecureArray(key.toUtf8()) );
00121 
00122         // create a 128 bit AES cipher object using Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode
00123         QCA::Cipher cipher(QString("aes256"),QCA::Cipher::CBC,
00124                            // use Default padding, which is equivalent to PKCS7 for CBC
00125                            QCA::Cipher::DefaultPadding,
00126                            // this object will encrypt
00127                            QCA::Decode,
00128                            m_key, iv);
00129 
00130         // take that cipher text, and decrypt it
00131         QCA::SecureArray plainText = cipher.update( QCA::SecureArray(data->toData()->data()) );
00132 
00133         // check if the update() call worked
00134         if (!cipher.ok())
00135             throw ModuleException("An error occured during the decryption process. (wrong password key?)",
00136                                   "An error occured during the cipher update !");
00137 
00138         // Again we need to call final(), to get the last block (with its padding removed)
00139         plainText += cipher.final();
00140 
00141         // check if the final() call worked
00142         if (!cipher.ok())
00143             throw ModuleException("An error occured during the decryption process. (wrong password key?)",
00144                                   "An error occured during the finalization of the cipher !");
00145 
00146         QPointer<EncodedData> result = new EncodedData(plainText.toByteArray(), Data::F_UNDEF, false);
00147         if(result->format() != Data::FILE)
00148             m_logger->debug("aes256 decryption of " + QCA::arrayToHex(data->toData()->data()) + " is "  + result->toString());
00149 
00150         return result;
00151     }
